Name: Knight
Flavor Text: An obscure knight if poor renown who collapsed roaming the land. Sturdy, owning ti high vitality and stout armor.

Name: Mercenary
Flavor Text: A mercenary and veteran of the battlefield. High dexterity allows wielding of dual scimitars.

Name: Warrior
Flavor Text: Descendent of norhtern warriors famed for their brawn. Utilizes high strenght to wield a heavy battleaxe.

Name: Herald
Flavor Text: A former herald who journeyed to finish a quest undertaken. Wields a sturdy spear and employs a gentle resorative miracle.

Name: Thief
Flavor Text: A common thied and pitful deserter. Wields a dagger indende for backstabs alongsite a military-issue bow.

Name: Assassin
Flavor Text: An assassin who stalks their prey from the shadows. FAvoures sorceries in addition to thrusting swords.

Name: Sorcerer
Flavor Text: A loner who left formal academia to pursue further research. Commands soul sourderies using high intelligence.

Name: Pyromancer
Flavor Text: A pyromancer from a remote region who manipulates flame. Also an adept at close combat who wields a hand axe.

Name: Cleric
Flavor Text: A traveling cleric who collapsed from exhaustion. Channels high faith to cast many and varied miracles.

Name: Deprived
Flavor Text: Naked and of unknown origin. Either an unimaginable fool in life, or was stripped of possession upon burial.
